item.title: Avoiding Type 3 Fonts in matplotlib Plots
item.description: So you’ve generated your figure/PDF with matplotlib and your conference/journal publishers tell you that you have unsupported font types. Chances are, based on my experience with ACM, you have some Type 3 fonts.

item.title: No Sunshine
item.description: Sometimes it can be hard to see the benefit of progress when, in order to move forward, we must leave behind a part of ourselves that weâ€™ve cherished so intensely.
